text: @Mike_Pence What are you going to do now that COVID-19 can be transmitted from mothers to their unborn children? Oh, that's right - you guys don't believe in science, in medicine,  or even in the sanctity of life. We don't have a president or a VP. Instead, we get Dumb and Dumber.
